db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in Qt 5.5.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: TumblerColumn represents a column within a tumbler, providing the interface to define the items and width of each column.
You can create a custom appearance for a Tumbler by assigning a TumblerStyle.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] activeFocus : bool
db:section.db:para: This read-only property indicates whether the item has active focus.
See Item's activeFocus property for more information.

db:section.db:title: columnForeground : Component
db:section.db:para: If set, this component will be used to display the foreground in this column, instead of the columnForeground property in TumblerStyle.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] currentIndex : int
db:section.db:para: This read-only property holds the index of the current item for this column. If the model count is reduced, the current index will be reduced to the new count minus one.

db:section.db:title: delegate : Component
db:section.db:para: The item delegate for this column.
If set, this delegate will be used to display items in this column, instead of the delegate property in TumblerStyle.
The implicitHeight property must be set, and it must be the same for each delegate.

db:section.db:title: highlight : Component
db:section.db:para: The highlight delegate for this column.
If set, this highlight will be used to display the highlight in this column, instead of the highlight property in TumblerStyle.

db:section.db:title: model : var
db:section.db:para: This property holds the model that provides data for this column.

db:section.db:title: role : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the model role of this column.

db:section.db:title: visible : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds the visibility of this column.

db:section.db:title: width : real
db:section.db:para: This property holds the width of this column.
